summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs of the Dallas City Council will convene on September 3, 2024, at 11:00 AM. This meeting will be held both in-person at Dallas City Hall and virtually, with the purpose of discussing administrative matters, including the finalization of a brochure for the City Manager.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the August 26, 2024, meeting.
2. Discussion on finalizing the Dallas City Manager Brochure prepared by Baker Tilly.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include a review of the brochure intended to enhance the recruitment process for the City Manager position. This document is crucial for presenting the city and its leadership to potential candidates.

**Action Items**:  
The committee will seek approval of the meeting minutes and aims to finalize the City Manager Brochure. Additionally, there may be discussions in an executive session regarding legal matters, property negotiations, or personnel evaluations, contingent upon the agenda items discussed.

The meeting will be broadcast live and is accessible to the public, ensuring transparency and community engagement.
